com.chbase

Class ConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chbase.ConnectionFactory

  • public class ConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating Connection objects. This factory is a helper to assemble Connection objects with their default strategies.

        public static Connection getConnection(java.lang.String appId)
        Gets the connection for the specified app id. All connections from this factory use the same private key.

        Returns:
